step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are stretched fully overhead and your fingers are spread wide.
You're making a good fist and pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together a bit more as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the smooth, controlled movement.
Great job on the repetitions. Focus on maintaining a consistent rhythm between inhaling and exhaling with each movement.
You're completing the repetitions well. Ensure your fingers are open wide when stretching overhead and making a firm fist when pushing down.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms fully overhead with fingers spread wide, then make a tight fist as you push down, squeezing your shoulder blades. Inhale as you tighten and exhale as you relax.
